name: Helicopter For Rescue Service
description:
Be prepared to live the most intense moment of your life with a Helicopter for rescue you will save lives .You will not only fly with the life saving helicopter but also race in the challenging mountain edge canyon roads! A lot of improvement driving skills and injustice flying skills are necessary to complete all the challenging missions of this life saving helicopter simulator.Take seat in your helicopter and get ready for some exciting flying rescue missions. Rush towards the emergency and save the people. Be the hero and take flight in this flight simulator game.The helicopter pilot has to suppress his fear & be calm like army helicopter pilots who fly their apache helicopters like air ambulances on a rescue mission to save all people.
This is the natural disaster in this challenging, thrilling and exciting air driving & parking simulator 911 emergency rescue simulation game.Become an emergency pilot and test your flying skill to their limits, If you love helicopter simulator games set in a 3D world then this game is the game for you to play.Your job in this insane heli sim 3D game is to fly to the people that need your help asap! You can read the information .After every new emergency call you get the flight information. You’ve got a skilled and an under training in your helicopter simulator to treat those legends patients.Join the Rescue Pilot Team as a rescue helicopter pilot to perform dangerous 911 firefighter missions.An epic speed driving can save like a army frontline commandos. Save lives with an ultimate rescue helicopter simulator mission.
Helicopter Simulator Rush for emergency landing.
We Sure you will be excited after playing this beautiful helicopter rescue game.This is the best game of boat rescue game.It’s easy to play the rescue game helicopter. This is good time pass life guard rescue game in which all the mission is on your hand.
Features:
-Multiple rescue Helicopters for selection
-Amazing real environment
-Extreme challenging mission game
